Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.rmi

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.rmi.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Observer, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualServer, Observer
This class represents the RMI server that manages the connection with the clients. It also initializes the socket server. It implements the VirtualServer interface and extends the UnicastRemoteObject class. It also implements the Observer interface to receive updates from the model.
See Also:

    • RMIServer

      private RMIServer(Controller controller) throws RemoteException
      This constructor creates a new RMI server with the given controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller of the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote connection

  • Method Details

    • getServer

      public static RMIServer getServer()
      This method returns the RMI server instance.
      Returns:
      the RMI server instance

    • pingStart

      private void pingStart()
      This method starts the ping control thread. It checks if the clients are still connected. If a client is disconnected, it terminates the game.

    • terminateGame

      public void terminateGame()
      This method terminates the game.

    • terminateGame

      private void terminateGame(boolean gameOver, int clientId) throws RemoteException
      This method terminates the game. If the game is ended, it sends the game over message to the clients. If some client has disconnected, it sends the terminate message to the clients.
      Parameters:
      gameOver - true if the game is ended or false if some client has disconnected
      clientId - the id of the client that has disconnected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote connection

    • resetGame

      private void resetGame()
      This method resets the game. It resets the controller and the clients list. It also adds the server as observer of the controller. It is called when the game is terminated.

    • connect

      public int connect(VirtualView client) throws RemoteException
      This method connects a client to the server. If the connection is accepted, it adds the client to the clients list and increments the number of clients connected.ù
      Specified by:
      connect in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      client - the client to connect
      Returns:
      the id of the client connected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote connection

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int onHandCard, int onTableCardX, int onTableCardY, int onTableCardCorner, int playerId, boolean isFront) throws RemoteException
      This method plays a card. It is called by the clients connected. It plays a card from the controller.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      onHandCard - the position of the card on hand
      onTableCardX - the x position of the card on the table
      onTableCardY - the y position of the card on the table
      onTableCardCorner - the corner of the card on the table
      playerId - the id of the player
      isFront - true if the card is played on the front side or false if it is played on the back side
      Returns:
      true if the card is played, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote connection

    • startServer

      public static void startServer()
      This method is the main method of the RMI server. It creates a new RMI server with the given controller and binds it to the registry. It also initializes the socket server. It is called when the server is started.
